Specimen Type(s): Surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dynamyx Digital Pathology Software enabling viewing, annotation, and management of scanned surgical pathology slides from FFPE tissue using digital whole slide imaging.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for viewing and management of digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides from FFPE tissue as an aid for pathologists in primary diagnosis; not intended for use with frozen section, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
